examples: Tacos aren't complete without a generous amount of grated cheese on top.
The fish tacos were topped with tangy slaw and creamy sauce.
We added sauerkraut to our tacos for an extra burst of flavor.
The menu featured a creative dish of beef plate tacos.
He added a squeeze of lemon to his fish tacos for a citrusy twist.
words.defineEn: a dish that consists of a folded tortilla filled with ground meat, beans, etc., originated in Mexico
words.defineVi: một món ăn bao gồm một chiếc bánh tortilla gấp lại chứa đầy thịt xay, đậu, v.v., có nguồn gốc từ Mexico

examples: It briefly sold Tex-Mex food with its version of chicken fajitas, made with chicken, cheese, green peppers, and onions on a tortilla.
words.defineEn: ‌a dish of strips of meat, cut up vegetables, and cheese wrapped in a tortilla and often served with sour cream, originated in Mexico
words.defineVi: ‌một món ăn gồm các dải thịt, rau cắt nhỏ và phô mai bọc trong bánh tortilla và thường ăn kèm với kem chua, có nguồn gốc từ Mexico

examples: The vegetarian menu offers a delicious black bean burrito as a protein-packed option.
He ordered a burrito with chipotle sauce, enjoying the smoky and spicy flavor it added to the dish.
I like to mix cooked brown rice with black beans, corn, and salsa for a flavorful and filling burrito filling.
I needed that burrito blanket.
And the burrito is that big.
words.defineEn: a dish of a tortilla wrapped around a mixture of ground meat or beans, originated in Mexico
words.defineVi: một đĩa bánh ngô bao quanh hỗn hợp thịt xay hoặc đậu, có nguồn gốc từ Mexico

examples: - They make a quesadilla.
Quesadilla, and then they make the cheese quesadilla, and then they wrap that as the surroundings for the burrito.
- They make it into a quesadilla.
Quesadilla, and then they make the cheese quesadilla, and then they wrap that as the surroundings for the burrito.
It's definitely like, the doneness of a quesadilla at the moment, so I think if I tried to roll this, it would not go too great.
words.defineEn: a dish of a tortilla filled with cheese and sometimes meat and then fried, originated in Mexico
words.defineVi: một đĩa bánh tortilla chứa đầy phô mai và đôi khi là thịt rồi chiên, có nguồn gốc từ Mexico

words.defineEn: a traditional Mexican dish made from slow-cooked, seasoned meat that is tender and flavorful
words.defineVi: một món ăn truyền thống của Mexico được chế biến từ thịt nấu chín chậm, mềm và có hương vị

words.defineEn: a Mexican dish made with fried or baked tortilla chips (or strips) simmered in a tomato or tomatillo sauce
words.defineVi: một món ăn Mexico được làm bằng bánh tortilla chiên hoặc nướng (hoặc dải) đun sôi trong nước sốt cà chua hoặc cà chua

words.defineEn: a Mexican breakfast dish consisting of fried or poached eggs served on top of tortillas
words.defineVi: một món ăn sáng của Mexico bao gồm trứng chiên hoặc luộc được phục vụ trên bánh ngô

words.defineEn: a Mexican dish made from dried, shredded beef or pork that is typically seasoned with spices
words.defineVi: một món ăn Mexico làm từ thịt bò hoặc thịt lợn khô, xé nhỏ thường được tẩm gia vị

words.defineEn: a Mexican dish made from a combination of various meats, cooked on a large, flat disc-shaped griddle called a disco
words.defineVi: một món ăn Mexico được làm từ sự kết hợp của nhiều loại thịt khác nhau, được nấu trên một vỉ nướng hình đĩa phẳng lớn gọi là disco

examples: But the modern boy band seems to really kick off in the early 1980s with groups like Menudo and New Edition.

But non-white boy bands (with exceptions for groups like Boyz II Men) largely did not have the same mainstream success of their all white counterparts, leading many to consider the boy band archetype to be groups like Backstreet Boys and New Kids on the Block, even though they were proceed by acts like New Edition and Menudo.
words.defineEn: a traditional Mexican soup made with beef tripe, typically simmered in a chili-based broth with hominy and seasoned with spices
words.defineVi: một món súp truyền thống của Mexico được làm từ lòng bò, thường được ninh trong nước dùng có ớt với hominy và nêm gia vị

examples: The renowned scientist, Dr. Rebecca Thompson, is considered the big enchilada in the field of quantum physics.
High-tech gadgetry is the spice, but not the whole enchilada.
The conference is attended by industry leaders and big enchiladas who share their expertise and insights.

Let's throw a party - birthday cake, balloons, the whole enchilada.
words.defineEn: a dish of tortilla filled with meat or cheese and covered with a spicy sauce, originated in Mexico

words.defineEn: a Mexican sandwich made with a sesame seed-covered roll, typically filled with meat, cheese, avocado

words.defineEn: a Mexican dish made with red rice cooked with tomato sauce, spices, and sometimes vegetables or meat

examples: He enjoyed a chili cheese frankfurter, smothered in homemade chili sauce and melted cheddar cheese.

words.defineEn: a spicy stew made from tomatoes, peppers, onions, and other ingredients, usually including ground beef or pork

words.defineEn: a Mexican dish made with tortillas filled with meat or other ingredients, and covered with mole sauce

examples: We make a lot of tamales.

Every once in awhile, my mom just randomly feels like making tamales and those are the best days.
